document_data.name: ''Cloak of Protection Versus Chaos''
document_data.creator: [[Taern Hornblade]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Cloaks of protection versus chaos''''' were [[enchanted]] protective [[cloak]]s created by [[Taern Hornblade|Taern "Thunderspell" Hornblade]] sometime before [[1372 DR]].
document_data.Powers: ''Cloaks of protection versus chaos'' functioned in similar fashion to ''+2'' ''[[cloak of protection|cloaks of protection]]'' when facing creatures and individuals of chaotic nature.
document_data.History:
''Cloaks of protection versus chaos'' were fashioned by Taern "Thunderspell" Hornblade of [[Silverymoon]] in preparation to an assault  by a deadly and chaotic [[orc]] army of the north. These magic cloaks were given out to [[ranger]]s and [[fighter]]s who stood agains the horde.

By [[1372 DR]], many of these enchanted pieces of fabric left Silverymoon and found themselves in the hands of various inhabitants of the [[Sword Coast]].
